page.title: 02Fishing in Filey.
page.content: The Winter season lasts from October until March/April.The fishermen use long lines with 200 hooks on,which is baited with mussels.This year 17 cobles fished out of Filey,9 cobles with a 3 man crew and 8 cobles with a 2 man crew. It takes 3 people ashore to put one man to sea,two skeiners and 1 baiter. Each fisherman take 4 lines,using 75kilos of mussels. The summer season lasts from 1st May to 31st August.The licence costs Â£200 per year payable to the Yorkshire Water Authority.Each Salmon and Trout caught has to be made and logged in a book and returned to the Yorkshire Water Authority at the end of the season.The cobles are only allowed to fish for salmon 5 days a week from Monday to Friday.
